About Changer

We build Web and mobile apps. We are a team of passionate geeks. We love solving problems and providing better solutions using stacks like django, node.js, asp.net. We are specialized in building apps with best User Experience.

see our work      meet the team

Our products

  • Jip.io

    Share the best you have with the people you choose.

  • Citycardz

    An easy way for tourists to send personalized postcards.

  • Getsurveyapp

    Say goodbye to paper. The simplest survey-app out there, on and offline!

  • Social Schools

    Our social schools platform brings your school to the web. Everyone participates: teachers, parents & children.

  • Incident Portal

    The easiest way to register incidents and aggregate them to reports

  • Audit tool

    Engage everyone in your organization's audits while keeping all audited requirements in a central database.
